Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
the missiles struck Malice head on and he falls back, and lands near an energon deposit.  He struggles to his feet, and drives both hands into the deposit.  The energy flows into him, speeding up his healing proccess, and after a moment he is fully healed and is draining the last of the energon for reserve.  He recovers his sword and rushed up to Blacknightmare.  Sheathing his sword,he moves to her side, puts her in a headlock, lifts her up, positions her over his knee, and brings he down hard on the spike knee cap.  He drops the femme, kicks her a few times, and prepares to finish her off.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Nightstrike/BlackNightmare:::


Nightstrike fell, while BlackGihtmare waited and in the last moment 
she jumped and fired 2 feather misillies against Malice

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malice reeled from the suprise shot from Blacknightmare.  Though 
he absorbed the energy, the fact he wasn't awar of the minion 
shooting at him brought him out of his zeal.  He grabbed his 
katanna, stabbed Night Strike in the right side of his chest then a 
side slash to his right flank.  He put in one final stomp before 
moving toward Blacknightmare.  He drew his disruptor rifle, slung 
the accellarator barrel into position, charged it, and fired a high 
velocity, piercing shot at the minion before charging forward with 
his Verte- Breaker sword drawn, and charged forward.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightstrike:
> 
> Nightstrike was stunned due all those strikes, looking that 
> BlackNightmare aimes and shot against Malcie, hoping save  his 
fellow
>

> charged him.  He could see out of his right optic, and saw Night 
> Strike almost on top of him.  He took a step back, clotheslined 
the 
> minion, and jumped up to stomp in Night Strike's mid section.  
After 
> he landed and Night Strike sprawled out, he grabbed both of the 
> minion's arms, pulled tight, and started stomping on Night 
Strike's 
> chest.  He also took the liberty of draining a little energy, his 
> reserve was low and he wanted to finish Night Strike off in a most 
> painful way.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightstrike:
> > 
> > Night strike quickly took dust and trow towards Malice's eyes 
when 
> > he was close, after that he rolled away and stood up and ran 
> toward 
> > Malice willingkill him right there
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:

> > >  
> > > Malice dropped both his swords and charged head on toward the 
> > oncoming strike.  The minion's sword pierced the bounty hunter's 
> > side, but Malice knocked Nightstrike's hand off the sword to get

reclaimed
